definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
unit (of measure)/unit (group of people as a whole)/work unit (place of employment, esp. in the PRC prior to economic reform)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to be located at/to be situated at/to lie
to get to the intended location/to be in place/to be in position/precise/well (done)
high position/eminent status/top job/raised position/upper (limbs)/a high (i.e. local maximum)/high point on scale, high grade, temperature, latitude etc

sentences.english: He's a good lecturer as he really knows his stuff.
sentences.chinese: 他是位好讲师，因为他确实精通业务。

sentences.english: Turn the dc meters switch to TR1.
Mr. Smith, a very white man, but a very yellow one.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯先生是位忠实可靠的人，但他很胆怯。

sentences.english: Being a stick-in-the-mud, people don't value his opinions.
sentences.chinese: 他是位呆头呆脑的人，大家不重视他的意见。

sentences.english: Move to the corner of 15th St. & 10th Ave.
sentences.chinese: 移动到第15届圣夫角落与第10位。

sentences.english: So far they have 17 women from all over the world who have been nominated.
sentences.chinese: 至今在全球范围内已经有17位女性被提名。

sentences.english: Please enter your 4-digit code to access parental control settings.
sentences.chinese: 请输入访问家长控制设置的4位代码。

sentences.english: Of the 35 highest-paid actors in 2010, 17 have won Academy Awards.
sentences.chinese: 在35位片酬最高的演员中，有17位拿过奥斯卡奖。

sentences.english: There have only ever been 106 verified supercentenarians in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 在英国也只有106位已核实的超级百岁老人。

sentences.english: The DM decides where the combatants are positioned on the battle grid.
sentences.chinese: 由DM决定参战者位在战斗方格的何处。

sentences.english: Her father, Joel, is an ophthalmologist.
sentences.chinese: 父亲约耳是位眼科医师。

sentences.english: The server part of the channel is located at the start of the server context sink chain.
sentences.chinese: 通道的伺服器部分位在伺服器内容接收链结的起始端。

sentences.english: Q. What effect do tabs, spaces, and new lines have on the program?
sentences.chinese: 制表位，空格和换行符对程序有什么影响？

sentences.english: She had evidently been a handsome woman, and was well preserved still.
sentences.chinese: 她显然曾是位漂亮的女人，而且保养得很好。

definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
the tens place (or column) in the decimal system
a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
